high_descs: Take a few steps to the right and look to the floor.
Pick up the dark cloth close to the wall.
Hold the cloth and look up.
Place the cloth on the shelf, in the center.
anns.task_desc: Move a cloth from the floor to a shelf.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the wall, then turn left to face the shelving.
Pick up the dark rag that is on the floor in front of the shelving.
Place the rag on the bottom right shelf.
anns.task_desc: Move a rag from the floor to a shelf.

high_descs: walk over to the toys on the floor on the right side of the room
pick up the black rag from the floor
approach the shelf directly ahead of you
place the rag on the shelf
anns.task_desc: get the rag from the floor and put it on the shelf.
